### Issue(s):

Type `x` in between `[ ]` and make sure there isn't any space between brackets. Example; for Your Selected Issue(s), type like this - `[x]` 
You can select more than one category of issues if you need to!

- [ ] Whitelist
- [ ] Blacklist
- [ ] App Broken
- [ ] Website Broken
- [ ] Request
- [ ] Other Issue
